results.idea: EPS momentum (analyst mean) — buy stocks with accelerating estimated EPS
results.description: Used est_eps (high coverage 0.7848, high userCount/alphaCount) and focused on time-series momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using analyst mean field only (strong signal). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not required (coverage>0.6). SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing high user/alphaCount fields. Kept implementation short and within operator/datafield limits. Confidence: 0.72 because est_eps is widely used and momentum tends to persist.

results.idea: Estimate revision — rank stocks by recent upward revisions in mean EPS
results.description: Used ts_delta on est_eps to capture revisions. SUGGESTION1 used multiple temporal operators; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: est_eps has many users/alphas. Implementation respects operator/datafield limits. Confidence: 0.68 (revisions predictive but noisier).

results.idea: Estimate vs previous announced actual EPS surprise (actual - estimate)
results.description: Combined announced EPS (anl4_af_eps_value, coverage 0.9956) with est_eps to form surprise. SUGGESTION1 applied by combining actual + estimate. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Chosen fields have high user/alphaCount. Kept <=2 fields and few operators. Confidence: 0.78 — earnings surprise is a robust short-term alpha.

results.idea: EBITDA estimate momentum — buy rising analyst EBITDA expectations
results.description: Used anl4_ebitda_value (coverage 0.8133, high alphaCount). SUGGESTION1 minimal (one strong field). SUGGESTION4 applied. No ts_backfill needed. Implementation concise. Confidence: 0.65 (EBITDA momentum helpful but sector-sensitive).

results.idea: EBIT estimate dispersion — favor low-estimate-std (analyst consensus)
results.description: Used anl4_ebit_std (coverage 0.4695 <0.6) so applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill to backfill. SUGGESTION1 used one dispersion field. SUGGESTION4: userCount decent. Kept short. Confidence: 0.55 because coverage was low and dispersion signal is moderate.

results.idea: Sales estimate momentum (mean) — preference to accelerating sales estimates
results.description: Used est_sales (coverage 0.7458, good user/alpha). SUGGESTION1 used analyst mean; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Short implementation. Confidence: 0.63 (sales momentum carries information).

results.idea: Free cash flow to sales — quality metric using FCF estimate divided by sales estimate
results.description: Combined est_fcf (coverage 0.5777 slightly below 0.6) and est_sales (0.7458). Applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill to est_fcf, and SUGGESTION1 to combine two fields. SUGGESTION4 prefers est_sales for stability. Kept <=2 datafields. Confidence: 0.61 due to moderate coverage on est_fcf.

results.idea: CapEx intensity — flag firms with falling capex relative to sales (capex/sales decline)
results.description: Used est_capex (coverage 0.6427) and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage OK (>0.6), so no backfill. Kept short. Confidence: 0.58 (capex changes sometimes predict margin changes).

results.idea: Estimate momentum normalized cross-sectionally — long stocks with top est_eps momentum after cross-sectional ranking
results.description: Used est_eps momentum plus cross-sectional quantile. SUGGESTION1 used multiple operators (ts_returns + quantile). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Kept operators <=3. Confidence: 0.69 (combines time-series and cross-section).

results.idea: Earnings momentum with winsorization — reduce outlier-driven bets
results.description: Used est_eps returns and winsorize to curb outliers. SUGGESTION1 applied. No backfill. Kept operators small. Confidence: 0.7 (winsorizing improves robustness).

results.idea: Analyst upgrade flow — use number of upper estimations trend (anl4_basicconafv110_pu momentum)
results.description: Used anl4_basicconafv110_pu (coverage 0.7343, high userCount). SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Short impl. Confidence: 0.6 — upgrade flow useful but noisy.

results.idea: Earnings revision surprise — recent delta between est_eps and previous estimate
results.description: Used est_eps and previous estimate field anl4_dez1qfv4_preest (coverage 0.964). SUGGESTION1 applied (two fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Kept concise. Confidence: 0.71 because revision magnitude often signals surprises.

results.idea: High consensus + upward revision — combine low std and positive revision
results.description: Used anl4_ebit_std (low coverage 0.4695 -> ts_backfill) and ts_delta(est_ebit,21). Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION3. Two datafields only. Confidence: 0.56 (combo promising but std field coverage weak).

results.idea: Net profit estimate acceleration — favor firms with rising est_netprofit
results.description: Used est_netprofit (coverage 0.7861, strong). SUGGESTION1 used single field momentum. No backfill. Confidence: 0.62 (net profit is meaningful).

results.idea: EBIT margin proxy: est_ebit / est_sales cross-sectional rank
results.description: Combined est_ebit (coverage 0.7309) and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 used two fields and cross-sectional ranking. No backfill. Kept operators <=3. Confidence: 0.64 (proxy captures profitability).

results.idea: Low analyst dispersion + positive momentum (consensus-strengthened momentum)
results.description: Used anl4_ebit_std (coverage<0.6 so ts_backfill) and ts_returns(anl4_ebit_value,63). SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied, two datafields. Kept concise. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Free cash flow momentum per share (short-term)
results.description: Used anl4_af_cfps_value (actual cashflow per share) or anl4_afv4_cfps_median if available; selected anl4_af_cfps_value (coverage 0.6156) borderline -> apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 combined time-series operator + backfill. Confidence: 0.54 (coverage moderate).

results.idea: Estimate momentum scaled by number of estimates (signal confidence weighting)
results.description: Used est_eps momentum and anl4_qfv4_eps_number (coverage 1.0) as weight. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION4: used number field with strong coverage. Kept <=2 datafields. Confidence: 0.66 (weighting by count enhances reliability).

results.idea: EBIT estimate mean reversion — short-term reversal after sharp run-up
results.description: Applied ts_max_diff to capture overextension on anl4_ebit_value (coverage 0.9483). SUGGESTION1 single strong field. No backfill. Confidence: 0.59 (mean-reversion edges).

results.idea: Analyst recommendation momentum (consensus score trend)
results.description: Used anl4_mark (recommendation consensus, coverage 0.6243). SUGGESTION3 not required (>=0.6). SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. Kept short. Confidence: 0.57 (recommendations predictive occasionally).

results.idea: High sales estimate dispersion pick — long top dispersion when accompanied by rising sales mean
results.description: Used sales_estimate_stddev (coverage 0.7259) and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 applied. No backfill needed. Confidence: 0.52 (dispersion + rising mean can signal divergent expectations).

results.description: Used sales_guidance_value (coverage 0.4262 -> backfill) and actual_sales_value_quarterly. Applied SUGGESTION3 to guidance. Two fields. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum in adjusted funds from operations (est_ffo) — albeit low coverage
results.description: Used est_ffo (coverage 0.0411 -> backfill) and ts_returns. SUGGESTION3 applied but low coverage limits confidence. Confidence: 0.28.

results.idea: Earnings consistency: high median and mean alignment (low skew)
results.description: Used anl4_afv4_median_eps and anl4_afv4_eps_mean (both high coverage). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.49.

results.idea: Rising gross income actuals vs estimates (actual - mean)
results.description: Used anl4_gric_value (actual) and anl4_gric_mean (estimate). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: High-quality earnings upgrade: est_eps up with falling estimate std for EPS
results.description: Used ts_delta(est_eps,30) and anl4_dts_rspe (reported EPS std coverage 0.4773 -> backfill). Applied SUGGESTION3. Two fields. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Significant rise in broker coverage (broker Id / counts) signaling attention
results.description: Used anl4_basicdetaillt_numest or anl4_bac1conafv110_item count proxies; used anl4_basicconafv110_numest (coverage 0.7343). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.48.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum scaled by winsorized dispersion
results.description: Used subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps) and winsorize to reduce outlier impact, then zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.69.

results.idea: Rising sales estimates but falling gross income estimates (warning signal)
results.description: Used est_sales and anl4_gric_mean. SUGGESTION1 applied two fields. No backfill. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings acceleration vs 1-year historical range (ts_max_diff)
results.description: Used ts_max_diff on est_eps over 252 days to detect new highs relative to the year. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Consensus upgrades concentrated in a short window (hump to reduce turnover) — trade only if sustained
results.description: Used ts_target_tvr_hump on ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_numest,21) to temper turnover. SUGGESTION1 applied and KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Reported vs guided shareholders' equity improvement
results.description: Used shareholders_equity_reported_value (coverage 0.6951) and max_shareholders_equity_guidance (coverage 1.0). SUGGESTION1 applied two fields. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term earnings revision acceleration filtered by ts_count_nans (data availability)
results.description: Used ts_delta(est_eps,21) and ts_count_nans(est_eps,63) to prefer well-populated series. SUGGESTION1 applied two operators and one datafield. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: EBIT surprise followed by raising capex (investor signal) — avoid or short
results.description: Used subtract(anl4_ebit_value, est_ebit) and est_capex momentum. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings quality: est_ebitda_mean growth with falling fcf dispersion
results.description: Used anl4_fcf_median (coverage 0.5545 -> backfill) and anl4_ebitda_mean. Applied SUGGESTION3 to fcf median. Two fields. Confidence: 0.51.

results.idea: Large revisions in basic shares outstanding (share dilution signals)
results.description: Used basic_shares_max_guidance_qtr and min_basic_shares_guidance (coverage 1.0) to detect change; SUGGESTION1 used guidance pair. Confidence: 0.47.

results.idea: Aggregate announced financials momentum (sum of major announced items)
results.description: Summed zscores of anl4_af_eps_value and anl4_ebitda_value to capture broad announced strength. SUGGESTION1 applied multiple fields (2). Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: High forecast dispersion contraction as buy signal (sales std)
results.description: Used sales_estimate_stddev (coverage 0.7259) and reverse to prefer contraction. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Earnings beat persistence: repeat positive surprises across periods
results.description: Checked sequence of subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps) across two recent periods via ts_product or ts_sum; used ts_sum for counts. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: High-quality growth: est_netprofit_adj growth with falling est_ebit_std
results.description: Used est_netprofit_adj (coverage 0.7731) and anl4_ebit_std (backfill). SUGGESTION3 applied for std. Two fields. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Sales growth outliers trimmed (winsorize then quantile)
results.description: Used winsorize on ts_returns(est_sales,63) then quantile to pick robust leaders. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.6.
